io.soabase.core

Interface SoaFeatures


  • public interface SoaFeatures
    Container for various Soabase singletons

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ADMIN_NAME
      Name for the admin JerseyEnvironment
      static String DEFAULT_NAME
      Default name to use for getNamed(Class, String)

      • getNamed

        <T> T getNamed(Class<T> clazz,
               String name)
        Return the stored named object
        Parameters:
        clazz - object's class
        name - name of the object
        Returns:
        the object or null

      • getNames

        <T> Collection<String> getNames(Class<T> clazz)
        Return the set of names registered for the given class
        Parameters:
        clazz - class to check
        Returns:
        set of names

      • getNamedRequired

        <T> T getNamedRequired(Class<T> clazz,
                       String name)
        Return the stored named object or throws NullPointerException
        Parameters:
        clazz - object's class
        name - name of the object
        Returns:
        the object (never null)
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if an object of the given class with the given name isn't registered

      • putNamed

        <T> void putNamed(T o,
                  Class<T> clazz,
                  String name)
        Registers an object with a name. The name must be unique for the given class. i.e. there can only be 1 object with a given name and class
        Parameters:
        o - the object
        clazz - the object's class
        name - name to store

      • getDiscovery

        Discovery getDiscovery()
        Return the service discovery instance
        Returns:
        service discovery instance

        Returns:

      • getExecutorBuilder

        ExecutorBuilder getExecutorBuilder()
        Access to the Dropwizard executor builders from the Dropwizard environment
        Returns:
        Dropwizard executor builders
